articles.title: Kevin Spacey: Oscar-winning actor due to appear in court after being charged with four counts of sexual assault - Sky News
articles.content:
Kevin Spacey is due to appear in court on Thursday after being charged with four counts of sexual assault, the Metropolitan Police has confirmed. 
The Oscar-winning actor has been charged in relatio… [+1558 chars]
